entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:27 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:27 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
